title: Add OS X native virtualization and light weight Veertu as a drop down for running Microsoft Edge VMs on Macs for Dev/test
body: In the https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-edge/tools/vms/mac/, you can add Veertu as a virtualization platform to run Microsoft Edge and other browsers for dev/test. Many developers with Mac are moving to Veertu because it's light weight, sandbox - Ideal for dev/test VMs and uses Apple native hypervisor framework.
